Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Nigrocin-2SCb (Nigrocin-1-OW1; Gly-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Odorrana schmackeri; Odorrana wuchuanensis, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram- bacteria E. coli (MIC 4.4 ug/ml), B. pyocyaneus (now called P. aeruginosa) (MIC 8.8 ug/ml), Gram+ bacteria S. aureus (MIC 8.8 ug/ml), and yeast C. albicans (MIC 4.4 ug/ml).  Found in multiple species. Also see Yang X et al. 2012 J Proteome Res. J Proteome Res. 11(1):306-19. Updated 5/2020; 7/2021 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Wang L, Evaristo G, Zhou M, Pinkse M, Wang M, Xu Y, Jiang X, Chen T, Rao P, Verhaert P, Shaw C.2010
Literature Information.Title: Nigrocin-2 peptides from Chinese Odorrana frogs--integration of UPLC/MS/MS with molecular cloning in amphibian skin peptidome analysis
